channel.title: Britain's Got Talent
channel.description:
I am pretty sure no one has posted a topic about this, but if so please feel free to lock it.
I wouldn't doubt almost all of you have heard about Britain's Got Talent. By far this is a very entertaining show, especially since Simon Cowell is also in this show.
Personally, my favorite two performances have been these two:
Susan Boyle: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9lp0IWv8QZY&feature=related]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9lp0IWv8QZY&feature=related[/url]
Shaheen Jafargholi: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VYDM3MIzEHo]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VYDM3MIzEHo[/url]
Personally I want Susan Boyle to win.
Discuss.

item.title: Britain's Got Talent
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

There are too many of these goddamn shows on tv. We have about 2-3 here in the Netherlands atm. And they are about to start a new season of the best idea of the Netherlands. I mean, if you really have a good idea just patent it and find some investors, don’t go to such a fucking social farting cock show.

Read full topic

item.title: Britain's Got Talent
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“la­wl, post:8, topic:274856”][quote author=T4_ link=topic=363134.msg2759069#msg2759069 date=1240420624]

TV sucks because they rig dumb situations just to make people watch.

Yeah, it’s all fake, including the ‘reality’ shows. This is the reason very rarely watch mainstream.
[/quote]
i dont get why people would be surprised that they are full of fake drama. its a reality show, that means its simulating reality not actually real shit. theres no way those shows would ever be popular if they didnt make 9999 drama shit, it would be boring without it[/quote]Old ladies are entertained by this shit for a reason. They have nothing better to do with their life.

Read full topic

item.title: Britain's Got Talent
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

The show is shit, just because the so called “great” Susan Boyle can sing fucking Opera (that no one knows shit about so can therefore not have an accurate opinion on) doesn’t mean she ain’t an ugly, fat, old bitch.

I personally hate shows like this because it’s just sucking away peoples time and money.

Read full topic

item.description:
